channel.title: Centos Emacs on Li Guangsheng
channel.description: Recent content in Centos Emacs on Li Guangsheng

item.title: 编译安装emacs25
item.description: 下载源码并解压 wget http://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/gnu/emacs/emacs-25.2.tar.gz tar xzvf emacs-25.2.tar.gz cd emacs-25.2 安装编译依赖 yum install -y gcc gtk2 gtk2-devel libXpm libXpm-devel libtiff libtiff-devel libjpeg-turbo libjpeg-turbo-devel giflib giflib-devel 编译 ./configure --prefix=/usr/local/emacs-25 make make install make时出现了aclocal-1.5.1 missing的错误，执行autoreconf -f -i后再make。 make install时出现makeinfo command not found，执行yum install texinfo。
